statements.select:
SELECT OUTSPECIMENID AS Outspecimenid,REQUESTCODE AS Requestcode,HOSPSAMPLEID AS Hospsampleid,HOSPSAMPLENUMBER AS Hospsamplenumber,PATIENTNUMBER AS Patientnumber,BEDNUMBER AS Bednumber,SAMPLINGDATE AS Samplingdate,PATIENTSOURCE AS Patientsource,PATIENTNAME AS Patientname,SEX AS Sex,CACULATEAGE AS Caculateage,PATIENTTEL AS Patienttel,LOCATION AS Location,PATIENTID AS Patientid,DOCTOR AS Doctor,DOCTORTEL AS Doctortel,BIRTHDAY AS Birthday,AGE AS Age,AGEUNIT AS Ageunit,SAMSTATE AS Samstate,DIAGNOSTICATION AS Diagnostication,CUSTOMERTESTCODES AS Customertestcodes,CUSTOMERTESTNAMES AS Customertestnames,DATESTCODES AS Datestcodes,DATESTNAMES AS Datestnames,STATUS AS Status,REMARK AS Remark,BABYCOUNT AS Babycount,LMP AS Lmp,LMPDATE AS Lmpdate,UNINEVOLUMN AS Uninevolumn,WEIGHT AS Weight,HEIGHT AS Height,BULTRASONIC AS Bultrasonic,PREGNANT AS Pregnant,ENTERBY AS Enterby,ENTERBYDATE AS Enterbydate,LASTUPDATEDATE as Lastupdatedate,CREATEDATE AS Createdate,USERTYPE AS Usertype,BODYSTYLE AS Bodystyle,CUSTOMERCODE as Customercode FROM DA_OUTSPECIMEN where 1 = 1
Outspecimenid != '$Outspecimenid$'
Enterbydate >= #dtpBeginDate#
Enterbydate <= #dtpEndDate#
SAMPLINGDATE >= #SamplingdateBegin#
SAMPLINGDATE <= #SamplingdateEnd#
Hospsampleid >= #Hospsampleid#
Hospsampleid <= #HospsampleidEnd#
Hospsamplenumber >= #HospsamplenumberBegin#
Hospsamplenumber <= #HospsamplenumberEnd#
Hospsamplenumber = '$txtHospsamplenumber$'
Hospsampleid = '$txtHospsampleid$'
Requestcode = '$txtRequestcode$'
Hospsamplenumber like '%$Hospsamplenumber$%'
Requestcode like '%$Requestcode$%'
Patientname like '%$Patientname$%'
Patientsource like '%$Patientsource$%'
Status = '$Status$'

SELECT OUTSPECIMENID AS Outspecimenid,REQUESTCODE AS Requestcode,HOSPSAMPLEID AS Hospsampleid,HOSPSAMPLENUMBER AS Hospsamplenumber,PATIENTNUMBER AS Patientnumber,BEDNUMBER AS Bednumber,SAMPLINGDATE AS Samplingdate,PATIENTSOURCE AS Patientsource,PATIENTNAME AS Patientname,SEX AS Sex,CACULATEAGE AS Caculateage,PATIENTTEL AS Patienttel,LOCATION AS Location,PATIENTID AS Patientid,DOCTOR AS Doctor,DOCTORTEL AS Doctortel,BIRTHDAY AS Birthday,AGE AS Age,AGEUNIT AS Ageunit,SAMSTATE AS Samstate,DIAGNOSTICATION AS Diagnostication,CUSTOMERTESTCODES AS Customertestcodes,CUSTOMERTESTNAMES AS Customertestnames,DATESTCODES AS Datestcodes,DATESTNAMES AS Datestnames,STATUS AS Status,REMARK AS Remark,BABYCOUNT AS Babycount,LMP AS Lmp,LMPDATE AS Lmpdate,UNINEVOLUMN AS Uninevolumn,WEIGHT AS Weight,HEIGHT AS Height,BULTRASONIC AS Bultrasonic,PREGNANT AS Pregnant,ENTERBY AS Enterby,ENTERBYDATE AS Enterbydate,LASTUPDATEDATE as Lastupdatedate,CREATEDATE AS Createdate,USERTYPE AS Usertype,BODYSTYLE AS Bodystyle,CUSTOMERCODE as Customercode FROM DA_OUTSPECIMEN where 1 = 1
Outspecimenid != '$Outspecimenid$'
Enterbydate >= #dtpBeginDate#
Enterbydate <= #dtpEndDate#
SAMPLINGDATE >= #SamplingdateBegin#
SAMPLINGDATE <= #SamplingdateEnd#
Hospsampleid >= #Hospsampleid#
Hospsampleid <= #HospsampleidEnd#
Hospsamplenumber >= #HospsamplenumberBegin#
Hospsamplenumber <= #HospsamplenumberEnd#
Hospsamplenumber = '$txtHospsamplenumber$'
Hospsampleid = '$txtHospsampleid$'
Requestcode = '$txtRequestcode$'
Hospsamplenumber like '%$Hospsamplenumber$%'
Requestcode like '%$Requestcode$%'
Patientname like '%$Patientname$%'
Patientsource like '%$Patientsource$%'
Status <= '$Status$' and Status >=3

SELECT OUTSPECIMENID AS Outspecimenid,REQUESTCODE AS RequestCode,HOSPSAMPLEID AS HospSampleid,HOSPSAMPLENUMBER AS HospSamplenumber,PATIENTNUMBER AS PatientNumber,BEDNUMBER AS BedNumber,SAMPLINGDATE AS SamplingDate,PATIENTNAME AS PatientName,SEX AS Sex, convert(varchar(8000),Age)+ (case ageunit when '0' then '岁' when '1' then '月' when '2' then '日'when '3' then '小时' else '' end ) Age,CACULATEAGE AS Caculateage,PATIENTTEL AS PatientTel,LOCATION AS SectionOffice,DOCTOR AS Doctor,DOCTORTEL AS DoctorTel,DIAGNOSTICATION AS Diagnostication,LMP AS Lmp,LMPDATE AS Lmpdate,BABYCOUNT AS BabyCount,UNINEVOLUMN AS UnineVolumn,BODYSTYLE AS Bodystyle,WEIGHT AS Weight,HEIGHT AS Height,BIRTHDAY AS Birthday,BULTRASONIC AS Bultrasonic,PREGNANT AS Pregnant,5 as Programid,DATESTCODES AS NaturalItem,CUSTOMERTESTNAMES AS NaturalItemDesc,CUSTOMERTESTCODES AS HospItemCode,REMARK AS Remark,ENTERBY as operateby ,Customercode as userName FROM DA_OUTSPECIMEN where 1 = 1
RequestCode = '$Requestcode$'

select os.customertestcode,os.datestcode,dr.testresult,os.hospsamplenumber,os.hospsampleid,a.Patientname,os.customertestname from dbo.da_outspecimentest os ,dbo.da_result dr,DA_OUTSPECIMEN a where os.hospsampleid=dr.hospsampleid and os.customertestcode=dr.customertestcode and os.hospsampleid = a.Hospsampleid and os.hospsampleid in ($value$)

select '' as col1,'' as col2,'' as col3,'' as col4, os.hospsampleid,'' as col6,'' as col7,'' as col8,'' as col9, dr.testresult from dbo.da_outspecimentest os ,dbo.da_result dr where os.hospsampleid=dr.hospsampleid and os.customertestcode=dr.customertestcode and os.datestcode = 'BBAH00010230'
and os.hospsampleid in ($value$)

SELECT Requestcode, Hospsampleid,Hospsamplenumber, Patientname,Sex,Age,Ageunit,Customertestnames FROM DA_OUTSPECIMEN where 1 = 1
Outspecimenid in ($Outspecimenid$)

SELECT count(*) as count FROM DA_OUTSPECIMEN where 1 = 1
Outspecimenid in ($Outspecimenid$)
select os.requestcode from Da_Outspecimen os where os.status<4 and os.createdate>getdate()-180

select OUTSPECIMENID AS Outspecimenid,REQUESTCODE AS Requestcode,HOSPSAMPLEID AS Hospsampleid,HOSPSAMPLENUMBER AS Hospsamplenumber,PATIENTNUMBER AS Patientnumber,BEDNUMBER AS Bednumber,SAMPLINGDATE AS Samplingdate,PATIENTSOURCE AS Patientsource,PATIENTNAME AS Patientname,SEX AS Sex,CACULATEAGE AS Caculateage,PATIENTTEL AS Patienttel,LOCATION AS Location,PATIENTID AS Patientid,DOCTOR AS Doctor,DOCTORTEL AS Doctortel,BIRTHDAY AS Birthday,AGE AS Age,AGEUNIT AS Ageunit,SAMSTATE AS Samstate,DIAGNOSTICATION AS Diagnostication,CUSTOMERTESTCODES AS Customertestcodes,CUSTOMERTESTNAMES AS Customertestnames,DATESTCODES AS Datestcodes,DATESTNAMES AS Datestnames,STATUS AS Status,REMARK AS Remark,BABYCOUNT AS Babycount,LMP AS Lmp,LMPDATE AS Lmpdate,UNINEVOLUMN AS Uninevolumn,WEIGHT AS Weight,HEIGHT AS Height,BULTRASONIC AS Bultrasonic,PREGNANT AS Pregnant,ENTERBY AS Enterby,ENTERBYDATE AS Enterbydate,LASTUPDATEDATE as Lastupdatedate,CREATEDATE AS Createdate,USERTYPE AS Usertype,BODYSTYLE AS Bodystyle ,CUSTOMERCODE as Customercode from Da_Outspecimen where status=0 and createdate>getdate()-3
statements.update: UPDATE DA_OUTSPECIMEN SET STATUS = #status#,Lastupdatedate=getdate() WHERE OUTSPECIMENID = #Outspecimenid#
UPDATE DA_OUTSPECIMEN SET STATUS = #Status#,Lastupdatedate=getdate() WHERE RequestCode = #RequestCode#
UPDATE DA_OUTSPECIMEN SET STATUS = #Status# WHERE Hospsampleid = #Hospsampleid# and RequestCode= #requestcode#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM DA_OUTSPECIMEN WHERE RequestCode in ($value$)
DELETE FROM DA_OUTSPECIMEN WHERE OUTSPECIMENID in (#value#)
